name: Apothecary, Inc.
description: Operator of a skincare marketplace intended to empower the skincare journey. The company's marketplace provides recommendations, trail sampling, and connects for advice from skin influencers, aestheticians, and dermatologists, enabling customers to have a constant guide for their skincare regime.
one_liner: Operator of a skincare marketplace intended to empower the skincare journey. The company's marketplace provides recommendations, trail sampling, and connects for advice from skin influencers, aestheticians, and dermatologists, enabling customers to have a constant guide for their skincare regime.

name: Baycon, Inc.
description: Operator of a B2C and B2B eSIM platform called 'eSIM Easy" with an emphasis on elevating roaming services for inbound and outbound travelers globally.
one_liner: Operator of a B2C and B2B eSIM platform called 'eSIM Easy" with an emphasis on elevating roaming services for inbound and outbound travelers globally.

name: Bluerabbit Global LLC
description: Developer of a digital application designed to create micro-social networks to foster communities in physical places. The company's application makes people interact within and between universities and provides a public feed where they can share stuff and ask questions to the community to increase community collaboration, enabling students to communicate better within their university.

name: CurieVision, Inc.
description: Developer of a 3D product generation platform designed to offer 3D shopping assistance. The company's platform allows shoppers to discover the best reviews and product news at the point of a camera, enabling customers to instantly educate and consense information and make purchases.
one_liner: Developer of a 3D product generation platform designed to offer 3D shopping assistance. The company's platform allows shoppers to discover the best reviews and product news at the point of a camera, enabling customers to instantly educate and consense information and make purchases.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Ecommerce, Retail, VR/AR, Deep Tech, Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality, Mobile, Commerce

name: HeartThis, Inc.
description: Provider of an online shopping platform. The company provides users with an online platform to purchase goods and accessories of various brands, with home delivery.
one_liner: Provider of an online shopping platform. The company provides users with an online platform to purchase goods and accessories of various brands, with home delivery.

name: Popsa Holdings Limited
description: Provider of automated photo book printing services intended to bring customizable printed goods to audiences using technology. The company's application uses narrow AI technology which auto-generates photo books with the selected photos and provides editing options, enabling users to create personalized prints such as photo books, calendars, and boxes of prints.

name: Sav Technologies Limited
description: Sav helps members save more, build wealth and reduce debt.

name: The Ticket Fairy, Inc.
description: Ticket Fairy is Salesforce meets Eventbrite - AI-enabled vertical SaaS for events and venues that skyrockets their revenues and accelerates their path to profitability!
